Question: One of the more controversial movie stars of her day, this person encountered many problems, including censorship.
Hints: After Go ****, Young Go **** starred in Every Day's a Holiday (1937) for Paramount before their association came to an end.
This person's next film was The Heat's On (1943) for Columbia Pictures.
Novak once commented, "I believe I was put on this Earth to take care of this person.".
